item.title: Flashing DD-WRT On A Linksys WRT1200AC V2
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: This weekend I decided it was time to replace the stock firmware on my WRT1200AC v2. I’ve had the unit for a while now and it’s been working well but I had a little time on my hands so I opted to give it a go. The process itself was pretty easy, but finding the right information was not. Hopefully this saves someone else some time…
